Row.Text: Religious Hermit

One of our soldiers has stumbled across an old, religious monk living far alone from civilisation. His religious views are unfamiliar to us, and go against our own. What should we do with him?[NEWLINE]
We should bring him back to our capital so that he may teach us his faith.
We should kill him.
We should leave him be.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital adopts {1_Religion}[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} {2_Yield}[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Nothing[ENDCOLOR]
We have been introduced to the teachings of {1_ReligionName} by a religious hermit.
In honour of our traditional ways, we have killed a religious hermit who believed in something different.
Sturlung Pressures

The Sturlung clan, wealthy and powerful throughout Iceland, have begun to place pressure upon the Althing; our parliament. Their influence is inescapable, and threatens the sanctity of our equitable system. However, if we respond, they may seek to displace the Althing completely, and Iceland could descend into civil war.[NEWLINE]
We must remind them of their place in our society.
We must strip them of their arms.
We must support them, so that, should they rise in power, we are in their favour.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]30% chance that the Sturlings will revolt[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital and all cities with a Thingstead begin celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 20 turns.[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]The Sturlings will revolt[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Skald[ENDCOLOR]

We have spoken with the head of the Sturlung clan and have ensured that they know their place beneath the Althing.
We have spoken with the head of the Sturlung clan and have ensured that they know their place beneath the Althing. They did not take kindly to this.

In our attempt to strip the Sturlung clan of their arms, the head of the clan eviscerated one of our guards and by this action has declared a revolt against the Althing. Our guess is that they preferred keeping their arms.
We have decided to support the Sturlungs slow creep to non-democratic power.
Ingolfur Arnarson of Iceland faces pressures from the powerful Sturlung clan.
A revolt has broken out in Iceland led by the Sturlung clan.
